Champion Select[]

Pick
  • ▶️   Sound Effect
  • ▶️   "Are you the hunter... or the prey?"
Ban
  • ▶️   "You wouldn't last a day in the Void."
  • Classic
  • Star Guardian

Original
Bullet Angel
KDA
Arcade
Inkshadow
Each of these skins may feature: a voiceover filter; additional quotes and/or interactions. In all other cases, skins use the base skin's audio or version of the audio. Some voicelines may also be disabled while using alternate skins.
Kai'Sa has alternate quotes with a voice filter while her helmet is ON. Toggling (default: Ctrl+5) and some abilities trigger this transition. All base quotes while her helmet is OFF are identical across all Classic skins.

Trivia[]

Kai'Sa, Daughter of the Void
  • ▶️  "I guess I'm next, Jax." is a response to ▶️  "Who's next?".
Bullet Angel Kai'Sa
  • ▶️  "Come with me if you wanna live." quotes Terminator 2.
  • ▶️  "I've seen things you people wouldn't believe, attack ships on fire on the shoulders of Or- ...Are those peaches?" quotes the "Tears in the Rain" monologue from Blade Runner.

Star Guardian Kai'Sa

  • ▶️   "I'm not alone, I'm not afraid."references the anime Puella Magi Madoka Magica, Season 1, Episode 3
  • ▶️   "Being a Star Guardian, I get to have my wish. The others who don't, I fight for them."references the anime Puella Magi Madoka Magica, Season 1, Episode 5
  • ▶️   "The more evil we stop, the more people we save. Whatever the cost, it's worth it.""references the anime Puella Magi Madoka Magica, Season 1, Episode 10
  • ▶️   "This power… it isn't just to fight darkness. It's to protect those I love."references the anime Puella Magi Madoka Magica, Season 1, Episode 6
